addpersonalurls-desc: Add some items to the personal URLs
addpersonalurls-preload: It works like any other wiki page; in particular, other users may be able to see or edit it.
addpersonalurls-home-preload: You can use this page as your personal home page.
addpersonalurls-favorites-preload: You can use this page to store your favorites.
addpersonalurls-sandbox-preload: You can use this page to test wiki code.
addpersonalurls-notes-preload: You can use this page for your personal notes.
